items.summary: Create a complete French (fr) UI translation pack by replacing the current `fr: commonTranslations` fallback with an explicit French dictionary in `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` (i.e., provide French values for all keys currently present in `commonTranslations`, preserving any emojis/icons where they exist).

Create a complete German (de) UI translation pack by replacing the current `de: commonTranslations` fallback with an explicit German dictionary in `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` (i.e., provide German values for all keys currently present in `commonTranslations`, preserving any emojis/icons where they exist).
